title: Generals ranked team, Recruiting gold V and up.
body:
Hey everyone, was playing some arams after ranked went down and started thinking about making a ranked team, add me in game if you would be interested in playing ranked teams professionally. of course there will still be fun but I would like to get atleast diamond.. MID JUNGLE ADC AND SUPPORT needed, I am willing to play any role if you want top but those roles would be preferred, 
thanks, ForeverFallen

replies.body: gold V, any lane is fine
im a plat adc main, add me in game

Support here, Not technically classified as being ranked however check my match history on support and it is overall very good, Have been having some extremely toxic people lately . Also last night had a stream of toxicity from mid laner which explains the losing streak - I play with gold/plat people daily so that shouldn't be an issue. I main Janna/Nami/Thresh/Leona/Blitscrank/Nautilus do essentially any support haha, let me know here as I'm not at home atm so can't check requests etc.
